item.title: Find IP
item.dc:creator: @realrune realrune
item.description:
@realrune wrote:

[scar]program WhatIsMyIp;

var
s, yourip: string;

begin
s:= GetPage(‘http://whatismyipaddress.com/’);
if(s = ‘’)then
begin
Writeln(‘Some kind of connection error’);
TerminateScript;
end else
begin
yourip := Between('Your IP address is ', ‘<’, S);
writeln('Your IP address is ’ + yourip);
end;
end.[/scar]
